options.text: This solution installs the data connector for ingesting Akamai Security Events. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector in the Data Connector gallery. The Akamai Security Events will be received in the CommonSecurityLog table in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace.

The solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel CommonSecurityLog format  . The CommonSecurityLog format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.
